# CLI Tooling

CLI documentation has moved to a dedicated section. See:

- [CLI Overview](/docs/cli/cli-overview) — all commands at a glance
- [refrakt inspect](/docs/cli/inspect) — preview transform output and audit CSS coverage
- [refrakt contracts](/docs/cli/theme-tools#refrakt-contracts) — generate structure contracts
- [Theme tools](/docs/cli/theme-tools) — scaffold-css, validate, and theme management
